summary: Export data to an openEO collection
description: Exports the given processing results made available through a STAC resource (e.g., a STAC Collection or Item) to the given openEO collection. The STAC resource itself is exported with all STAC resources and assets underneath.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data to export to the openEO collection.

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The identifier of the collection to export to. If the collection **exists**, the data will be added to the collection. If the collection **does not exist** yet, it will be created based on the given STAC metadata.
